thread.title: No Junk Mail Please
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by No Junk Mail Please

author: No Junk Mail Please
title: No Junk Mail Please
text:
This is my third [3rd] swing arm bag from Viking Bags for my Harley-Davidson Fatboy lo. I love these bags for carrying my essentials and they look great on the bike.
I always have to replace the straps with 1/4" zip-tie straps because the stock straps come loose causing the bag to sag and scrap the pavement on left turns. I use two [2] zip-ties per slot [total of 8] and it holds to my motorcycle like a rock. Downside, you can't remove the bag during overnights.
Shipping is a problem when the packer crams an unneeded box of saddlebag hardware [it doesn't use any] and nuts / bolts that warp the bag during shipping. The box is only large enough for just the swing arm bag and it damages [WARPS] the bag.
If it were not for the shoddy / stupid inclusion of the unnecessary hardware warping the swing arm bag, I would have given five [5] stars because I love the product.
